An open source exploration into the world of Korean Baseball Cheerleaders. Explore the vibrant world of Korean Baseball cheerleaders with our interactive app. Discover profiles, photos, and details about your favorite KBO League cheerleaders in one place!

## Installation

You can install the development version of KBOCheerleaders from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("JBC-Inc/KBOCheerleaders")
```
